hibernate-mapping.query: select new branchdto ( b.BranchAlias ) from PFMORM00037 as b where b.OtherBank = 0 and b.Active = true
select new branchdto ( b.BranchCode, b.BranchDescription, b.BranchAlias ) from PFMORM00037 as b where b.OtherBank = 0 and b.BranchCode <> :sourcebranchcode and b.Active = true order by b.BranchCode

select new branchdto ( b.BranchCode, b.BranchDescription, b.BranchAlias ) from PFMORM00037 as b where b.OtherBank = 0 and b.BranchCode <> :sourcebranchcode and b.BranchCode in (:branchcodelist) and b.Active = true order by b.BranchCode

select new branchdto( b.BranchCode, b.BranchAlias, b.BranchDescription, b.Address, b.Fax, b.Phone, b.Email, b.StateCode, b.CityCode, b.TownshipCode, b.OtherBank, b.Bank_Alias ) from PFMORM00037 as b where ( b.BranchCode =: branchCode) and b.Active = true

select new branchdto( b.BranchCode, b.BranchAlias, b.BranchDescription, b.Address, b.Fax, b.Phone, b.Email, b.StateCode, b.CityCode, b.TownshipCode, b.OtherBank, b.Bank_Alias, b.Active, b.TS, b.CreatedDate, b.CreatedUserId, b.UpdatedDate, b.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00037 as b where b.Active = true

select new branchdto( b.BranchCode, b.BranchAlias, b.BranchDescription, b.Address, b.Fax, b.Phone, b.Email, b.StateCode, b.CityCode, b.TownshipCode, b.OtherBank, b.Bank_Alias, b.Active, b.TS, b.CreatedDate, b.CreatedUserId, b.UpdatedDate, b.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00037 as b where b.BranchCode = :branchCode and b.Active = true
